title: The Scariest First Words You've Heard in Lobby
body:
"I main {{champion:11}} "

What are some of yours?

replies.body:
"Diamond smurf"
"Plat Smurf"
"Gold Smurf" 

lol pls.
"Bronze Smurf"

"Unranked smurf"
That would be me and my smurf account on OCE >.>

> [{quoted}](name=Xochtil,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LOUbB7c6,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-08-13T18:34:05.833+0000)
>
> "Diamond smurf"
> "Plat Smurf"
> "Gold Smurf" 
> 
> lol pls.

bronze smurf let me mid

wood V smurf 
feed or afk

mid or feed.

They always lock mid, and they always feed anyway.
Instead of "or," they should just say "and."

Frankly, that's not necessary correct from the mathematician's perspective.

The disjunction("or") is only false when both premises are false.

In other words:
If they went mid and still were feeding, they didn't lie saying "mid or feed".
True, but in the common usage, "or" is treated as exclusive rather than inclusive, hence the construct "and/or".

We just need to have them specify

"Do you mean XOR instead of OR?"
MID XOR FEED
mid xor feed

"i main {{champion:432}}"

that usually gets people to dodge :^)
idk <_< a person who has mastered bard is a **threat**
Mastered =/= main
+1 for TRUTH

My first ranked pentakill was on {{champion:11}}. He isn't my main but he is one of my top junglers, and he can carry very well if you know what you are doing.

Also people seem to /ff the moment he gets a quadra.
Don't think you're on the right thread.

"you're wearing a red T-shirt and black shorts, they look good on you"


O-O ....

To be honest, "Scariest" is the wrong word here.

Regardless, I always dodge when I see this in the chat:
_"I'm drunk as fuck."_

Or, "Guys I'm gonna go smoke while the game is loading don't worry if I'm a little late"
20 minutes later...
"I'm drunk as fuck" Most of the people who say that aren't even of legal age to drive yet I bet just kids who trying to act cool.It's even worse when they feed like the Redcross and say that bullshit

" Warning my PC regularly crashes " 
" If we aren't doing well I'm going to AFK " 
" Those bans are horrible why did you ban Sejuani insted of Teemo or Yasuo? " ( This was when Sej had an 80% ban rate.)
id rather deal with sej at her peak than one more god damn {{champion:17}}
"If you dont feed, I can carry"

worst thing to hear?

" "

cmon guys I want to know what the fuck we're doing here.

after 2nd last pick locks something then FINALLY writes in chat
 "top"
"but someone already locked in and called"
"duo top then"

....

The scariest words are no words.

Just locking in Riven with teleport even though your actual top laner's already locked in.

"I only play Yasuo"
"mid or feed"
"river shen" Those were literally the only two words he used in the game as well. He played shen in the river lane. Not the jungle. The river. He ended positive and the enemy team surrendered ._. He farmed the scuttle crabs. On the bright side, his sustain was incredible.
"is anyone else baked?"
"I'm so drunk" 
"troll or feed"
River Shen?  What the hell?? XD

In ranked game

Locks in {{champion:35}} 

"Wait this isnt bots? Did i join norms?"

He had to be a troll but someone dodged so fast i couldn't reply to that idiot XD
"Oops, thought this was ARAM"
Hagel Teemo! Herrn der Finsternis und Elend!
The forum meme-god!  I am honored to have you comment on my thread! :-D.  And I also hope never to see ^that^ in one of my games xD

"dont take my farm or kills" -that one adc, not the majority, but that one

Ah, one of many reasons I don't primarily main support anymore.
I make it a point to take 1 minion per wave when they have that attitude. Most of the time that player misses half the wave anyways i'm not gonna let it all go to waste.
Because i'm a spiteful mofo like that. I WAS gonna be polite and let you have it all but now you're sharing with me.

Dat one salty adc main downvoting us! >:D

But seriously, very few players are like that. The reason I dread is that they're just the entitled kind to explicitely say "muh farm, muh kills" like it's some CoD deathmatch. If I'm supporting you, *of course I'm not going to try and take farm and kills, for fuck's sake.* You play adc, and let me support properly. Jeezus.

Yeah i very rarely run into one for some reason it's always {{champion:119}} or {{champion:67}}, they're the type to talk shit for 15 minutes after you steal a kill on accident AND APOLOGIZED calling you a "worthless supp report" even though you've got great vision on the whole river and you've kept them from dying all game smh. 

Support mains unite! {{champion:16}}{{champion:16}}{{item:2049}}{{champion:16}}{{champion:16}}

And let me guess... they never buy a ward once ("it's the support's job to ward"), never use and/or upgrade their trinket, and for bonus Vaynespotting points the Vayne will tumble directly into a Thresh hook because "muh mechanics."

But hey, as support mains, let's remember that almost all *real* adc mains are pretty chill. Especially if they let you execute a cannon minion with relic shield, or blow one of their cooldowns to save you instead of using you as a meat shield.
"Oh God this guy again."

This goes back to season 1 and 2:

"huehue mordekaiser #1"
mid or cyka
"Duo Bot"

"lets all go mid"
I would dodge that match faster than I would a bee flying at my face .__.

I had a team that did that once in a blind-pick normal game.  It was solo-queue and everyone called 'Fill' which surprised all of us, so we started joking around, trying to figure out who was going where.  Eventually we settled on the most reasonable plan:  All mid.  

I was Viktor (this was before his rework), and the rest of my team was an Akali, Mundo, Caitlyn, and Sona (pre-rework).  The Akali was the only one that didn't play along at the start, so she went top, but the rest of us went mid.  We shoved lane hard and got the first tower at about 4 minutes.  The enemy team gave a lot of 'WTF's in All Chat at the start, but when we killed the enemy Fizz and took his first tower, the other lanes came to save it.  Apart from the Fizz, I don't remember who was on their team, but despite our lower levels, we managed to push them out and get the second tower at about 10 minutes.  We hit level 6, and tower dove with the help of the now level nine Akali.  This resulted in an ACE and we took the next tower and the inhib.  The game went back to 'normal' after that, but even though we were slightly behind in levels, we had gotten kind of fed, so we held off the enemy's attempts to counter-push us.  They surrendered at 20, and post-game chat was full of my team essentially just repeating "Holy crap, that actually worked!"  It was one of the funniest and most fun games I've ever played.  Everyone on my team was really relaxed and goofing off, making bad jokes throughout the entire game.  I really wish all my games were like that, but they're rare, so I try to hold on to memories like that.  

*Back to the main subject...*  
I hate hearing "Don't ban <insert flavor-of-the-month assassin here>."  It's worse when the person saying it is fourth or fifth pick.  Either the champion gets banned and the player is mad about that, or the enemy team gets it and you need to fight the annoying/broken champion.
"I'm gonna teach you guys how to play." *proceeds to link YouTube and Twitch stream*

"<summoner name here> and I are duo bot"

In lower elo, that NEVER pans out well.  They only like to talk to each other and ignore the rest of the map

My own words...

"OMG! That guy has AFK in his freaking name!"

2 guesses what happened?

"Hi {{champion:78}} main."

"Hi challenged smurf {{champion:92}} top only"
